refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets scaling and range limits for certain Wiimote fields.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in wiimote. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Sets scaling and range limits for certain Wiimote fields.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: This opcode must be used in conjuction with a running wiiconnect opcode.
icontrol -- which control is to be scaled. This must be one of 20 (WII_PITCH), 21 (WII_ROLL), 30 (WII_NUNCHUK_PITCH), 31 (WII_NUNCHUK_ROLL).

note.para: Please note that these opcodes are currently only supported on Linux.
